maxpleaner.github.io

View the Project on GitHub MaxPleaner/maxpleaner.github.io

step_sequencer

  • (ruby, command line) - polyrhythmic drum machine and sound manipulations

sounds

  • (ruby, command line) - turns keyboard into drum set

muzak

  • (coffeescript, html5) - a website to create sounds using oscillators, record them, and play them on a polyrhythmic grid.

music_sharing

  • a site for sharing music with friends. Add embeds from Youtube/Soundcloud/Bandcamp as well as comments / tags

bandcamp_labels

  • a site which lists record labels on bandcamp and can filter by tag. The list was obtained by scraping and it not comprehensive.

my_music

  • creates a static website of listenable/downloadable songs given youtube or bandcamp urls in a DSL

mindless

  • web interface for watching a curated set of youtube playlists

chiptune-cli

  • ruby repl for playing some sounds

youtube-audio-downloader

  • little wrapper over youtube-dl

This project is maintained by MaxPleaner
